meanings.sent1: She gormandises on chocolates when she's stressed.
meanings.sent2: He gormandises on pizza every Friday night.
meanings.sent3: The cat gormandises on tuna as if it's the best treat in the world.
meanings.sent4: The dragon in the story gormandises on gold, hoarding it all for itself.
meanings.sent5: The child gormandises on candy until their stomach hurts.

meanings.sent1: During holidays, she gormandises on all the festive treats.
meanings.sent2: He gormandises on burgers whenever he goes to that restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gormandises on nuts, storing them for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The black hole gormandises on everything that comes too close.
meanings.sent5: The party guests gormandises on the delicious buffet laid out for them.
